data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Simdega to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Simdega, Jharkhand, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Simdega, Jharkhand, India humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.section_summary: On average, 48 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Simdega, Jharkhand, India.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Simdega a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Simdega, Jharkhand, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Kawar people.
Jesus, please give your people in Simdega, Jharkhand, India a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Simdega access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, may the churches in Simdega, Jharkhand, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

location.name: Simdega
location.people_groups_list: Nagarchi (Muslim traditions), Munnewar, Gandharb (Hindu traditions), Gandhmali, Bedia (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Nagarchi (Muslim traditions) (200), Munnewar (600), Gandharb (Hindu traditions) (15,000), Gandhmali (13,000), Bedia (Hindu traditions) (553,000)
